xyz.fsgek.common.net.tcp

Interface GekTcpServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GekTcpEndpoint

    @ThreadSafe
public interface GekTcpServer
extends GekTcpEndpoint
    TCP/IP server interface, server endpoint of GekTcpEndpoint. The implementation should use GekTcpChannel to represents connection between server and remote endpoints. And should support following types of callback handler:
    • one GekTcpServerHandler: to callback for server events;
    • a list of GekTcpClientHandler: to callback for connection events;

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GekTcpServer.Builder
      Builder for GekTcpServer, based on ServerSocket.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GekTcpServer.Builder newBuilder()
      Returns new builder of GekTcpServer.
      default void start()
      Starts this server and wait until the server and all connections have been closed.
      void start(boolean block)
      Starts this server.
      GekTcpServer.Builder toBuilder()
      Returns a new builder configured with this server.

      • Methods inherited from interface xyz.fsgek.common.net.tcp.GekTcpEndpoint

        close, close, closeNow, getAddress, getPort, getSocketAddress, getSource, isClosed, isOpened

    • Method Detail

      • newBuilder

        static GekTcpServer.Builder newBuilder()
        Returns new builder of GekTcpServer. The returned builder is based on ServerSocket.
        Returns:
        new builder

      • start

        default void start()
        Starts this server and wait until the server and all connections have been closed. This method is equivalent to start(boolean): 
             start(true);

      • start

        void start(boolean block)
        Starts this server. If given block is true, this method will block current thread until the server and all connections have been closed.
        Parameters:
        block - whether block current thread

      • toBuilder

        GekTcpServer.Builder toBuilder()
        Returns a new builder configured with this server.
        Returns:
        a new builder configured with this server
